game.name: Rise of the Penguins 2
game.desc: Penguin's Dark Ascent: Rise of the Penguins 2 - A dark and challenging 2D platformer adventure where you guide penguins through treacherous environments, battle fierce enemies and bosses, and uncover a mysterious story. Features multiple levels, complex enemy AI, boss battles, inventory management, and rich storytelling powered by Dialogic.
